ResourceHeader.ResourceName: SECCHI Weekly and Bi-weekly Synoptic Movies from all Telescopes

RevisionEvent.Note: STEREO SECCHI: Initial SPASE XML resource description submission. Metadata submitted by A. Vourlidas on 2022-02-20, reviewed by LFB

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Weekly and Bi-weekly summaries of the SECCHI observations from all telescopes in MPG format.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The SECCHI data are produced by an international consortium of the Naval Research Laboratory, NRL, Lockheed Martin Solar and Astrophysics Laboratory, LMSAL, and NASA GSFC (USA), RAL and the University of Birmingham (UK), Max Planck Institute for Solar System Research, MPS, (Germany), Centre Spatial de Liège, CSL, (Belgium), and Institut d'Optique Théorique et Appliqueé, IOTA, and Institut d'Astrophysique Spatiale, IAS, (France).

PublicationInfo.Authors: Howard, R.A., J.D. Moses, A. Vourlidas, et al.
